a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global child deaths by cause, 1990 to 2019
Shown is the absolute number of deaths of children under the age of 5, by cause.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: The number of live births has increased over this period. It is useful to compare [deaths as a share of live
